comments.author: Lance Zechinato
comments.body: Appears to have been introduced with JCR-463

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Fixed in revision 486405. Thanks for reporting this!

description:
Incorrectly spelled "Trasaction" now in codebase.  The correctly spelled "Transaction" appears a far greater number of times.

Isolated to package: org.apache.jackrabbit.jca

Incorrectly  spelled "Trasaction" found in:
(3x) JCAManagedConnection.java 
(7x) JCAManagedConnectionFActory.java

Correctly spelled "Transaction" found in:
(20x) JCAManagedConnection.java 
(2x) JCAManagedConnectionFActory.java 
(1x) JCAResourceAdapter.java 
(12x) TransactionBoundXAResource.java
summary: Variant spelling "Trasaction" and "Transaction" now in codebase
